Package controller

Class CinemaController

java.lang.Object
controller.CinemaController
public class CinemaController extends Object
Controller for all cinemas and its showtimes and seats, contained inside of a cineplex object
Since:
2022-11-13
Version:
1.0

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private CinemaDAO
    cinemaDao
    CinemaDAO to get and save data to database
    private ArrayList<Cinema>
    cinemas
    Contains an arraylist of all cinemas objects in a particular cineplex
    private int
    cineplexId
    CineplexID of this particular cinemaController object

    Constructor
    Description
    CinemaController(int cineplexId)
    Constructor to create Cinema Controller Automatically load all cinemas from database, trigger the loading of all showtimes and seats inside of all cinemas

  • Constructor Details

    • CinemaController

      public CinemaController(int cineplexId)
      Constructor to create Cinema Controller Automatically load all cinemas from database, trigger the loading of all showtimes and seats inside of all cinemas
      Parameters:
      cineplexId - ID of cineplex associated with this controller

  • Method Details

    • save

      public void save()
      Save method called to save all cinemas object changes, trigger the save method of showtimeController of all cinemas

    • getAllCinemas

      public ArrayList<Cinema> getAllCinemas()
      Get all cinemas of this particular cineplex that has this controller
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all cinemas objects

    • getCinemaByCode

      public Cinema getCinemaByCode(int code)
      Get cinema object by its code
      Parameters:
      code - Cinema code (1, 2, 3, ...)
      Returns:
      Cinema object that has the corresponding code

    • getCinemasCount

      public int getCinemasCount()
      Get number of cinemas associated in this controller
      Returns:
      Number of cinemas

    • displayAllCinemas

      public void displayAllCinemas()
      Display all cinemas information contain in this controller

    • createCinema

      public void createCinema(int height, int width, Cinema.showClassOptions c, String s)
      Pass information for a particular cinema, create new cinema object and add to current cinemas list, make necessary file creation to the database
      Parameters:
      height - Height of seat array of this cinema
      width - Width of seat array of this cinema
      c - Cineplex ID corresponding to this cinema
      s - Seat configuration string, should have a length of (height x width) and only contains 'S' and 'X'

    • isMovieExist

      public boolean isMovieExist(int movieId)
      Check whether a particular movieId exists or not
      Parameters:
      movieId - ID of a movie
      Returns:
      True if a movie object with this ID exist, otherwise false

    • displayCinemaAndShowtimeByMovieId

      public ArrayList<Integer> displayCinemaAndShowtimeByMovieId(int movieId)
      Display all cinemas and its corresponding showtime that shows a particular movie
      Parameters:
      movieId - The ID of a movie which the user wants to watch
      Returns:
      ArrayList of all valid CinemaID (that shows this movieId)
